ai-patthana24.14:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.14:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.14:1.1_1: Nor causes and reasons for the sake of conjuries that gives rise to causes.
ai-patthana24.14:2.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana24.14:3.1_0: Nor causes and reasons for the sake of causes.
ai-patthana24.14:3.1_2: Nor causes and reasons for the sake of causes and conditions for the sake of causes and conditions.
